title: RGIPT Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Lab Attendant Posts
description: The Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology (RGIPT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Lab Attendant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, M.E./M. Tech, B.Sc, and M. Sc can apply for the RGIPT Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned ...
